text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Tadah! Pop quiz for you! Who's the super cool, ultra wonderful, greatest horsegirl in the world?!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Tick, tock, tick, tock…… Quick, quick, 
you only have 30 seconds left!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Shut it. You expect me to play along 
with your dumb game?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ehhh, Sirius, don't tell me you can't answer such a simple question? Aw, you're so hopeleeess.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I'll give you a big hint then! 
The horsegirl in question, she～……

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Tsk…… Even if I knew her name, I'd never say it. No matter how much everyone else agrees, I never will…!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
You were that conscious of me!? 
Aw, you're making me blush～! 
That's right, the answer was me, Tokai Teio♪

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, you think everyone agrees～?♪ 
I didn't expect you to acknowledge 
my strength like that!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Huuuuuh!? No, damn it! You little…… stop dancing! Don't get carried away!
